verses.text: Not unto us, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and* for thy truth’s sake.
Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is* now their God?
But our God is* in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
Their idols are* silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:
They have ears, but they hear not: noses have they, but they smell not:
They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.
They that make them are like unto them; so is* every one that trusteth in them.
O Israel, trust thou in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: he is* their help and their shield.
O house of Aaron, trust in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: he is* their help and their shield.
Ye that fear the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, trust in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: he is* their help and their shield.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** hath been mindful of us: he will bless us;* he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.
He will bless them that fear the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, both* small and great.+ 115.13 and: Heb. with*
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
Ye are* blessed of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** which made heaven and earth.
The heaven, even* the heavens, are* the \+w LORD’s strong="H3068"\+w**: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.
The dead praise not the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**, neither any that go down into silence.
But we will bless the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w** from this time forth and for evermore. Praise the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**.
